story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2010, Bakırcılar Software has been operating in the software industry for over 15 years. We offer services in a wide range from web applications to mobile applications, from cloud solutions to artificial intelligence integrations.
story.paragraph2: By prioritizing customer satisfaction, we have become a trusted brand in the industry with quality software products and on-time delivery guarantee. With our experienced software team and modern technologies, we provide solutions for projects of all sizes.
story.paragraph3: With our innovative technology approach, continuous learning culture and sustainable software development model, we act thinking about both today and the future.

aboutPage.visionDetailed: To become a leading development and consulting company in the software industry by meeting constantly changing technology demands at the highest level in the Turkish and global market.
aboutPage.missionDetailed: To contribute to our customers' digital transformation by offering innovative and scalable software solutions without compromising our principles of quality, speed and reliability.
